arts.ttl: Florenzi previews Milan-Roma, discusses striker dilemma and names Scudetto favourites
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Alessandro Florenzi spoke to Gazzetta dello Sport ahead of the big game between AC Milan and Roma, having played for both clubs in his career. Florenzi spent his last years as a professional footballer at Milan before announcing his retirement in the summer. Although injuries made things difficult for him with the Rossoneri, he still […] The post Florenzi previews Milan-Roma, discusses striker dilemma and names Scudetto favourites appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: GdS: Allegri ponders new attacking duo for Milan-Roma as Leao recovers – the latest
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Rafael Leao has recovered for tomorrow’s clash between AC Milan and Roma, as highlighted by Gazzetta dello Sport, and he will certainly play a key role for the Rossoneri. Milan have been struggling with injuries in the last few weeks, and when reports suggested that Leao was in doubt for this weekend’s game, things were […] The post GdS: Allegri ponders new attacking duo for Milan-Roma as Leao recovers – the latest appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Milan coach Allegri set to rely on Leao against Roma
arts.sum: This morning’s edition of Tuttosport headlines: "News: Leao has recovered. The weight of the attack is on him" Yesterday brought good news from Milanello regarding Rafael Leao's condition. After training separately on Thursday, the Portuguese forward returned to full group training. He will be on the pitch tomorrow night against Roma at San Siro. The […]
